website_summaries.verdict: A more expensive model that can heat a larger room with ease. Many safety features.
cons: Sometimes makes noise, in spite of manufacturer's "quiet" claims

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 1 Month
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this heater on 1/8/18. It stopped working on 2/11/18. For about a month we really enjoyed using it. We liked that you could chose a temperature and it would turn on/off automatically to keep the room at that temperature. For instance, we would set the temperature to 72 for our baby's nursery, and it would keep that room very comfortable for a baby, while the rest of the house we kept cooler per our preference. For being so expensive, this malfunction should not be happening after one month. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat undependable
customer_reviews.text: The heater was on/off all over the place and never steadily adhered to the 70-degree temperature that it was set to, leaving our bedroom very cold much of the night here in the Brooklyn winter. Directions also minimal, offering no suggestions to alleviate this. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Client Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Returned. This was obviously a returned item being resold ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned. This was obviously a returned item being resold as new - packaging was taped. When we turned on the heater, it had a burning smell which set off the fire alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Hungry Buya

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - stopped working in a week. Would Not Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Had this a week and it stopped working. I'm cold. And now having to order a replacement because I threw away the box and paying to 1 day ship a replacement. We're done Vornado. You have a quality problem.
customer_reviews.author: P. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great heater.
customer_reviews.text: This heater met all what I needed. It can be ran continuous or auto. Also works as a fan. When you run it on continuous and you adjust the temperature it gets hotter or colder depending on which way you adjust it which is nice. What's also gonna be important to me is longevity so hope for the best. Hope the company does well on their warranty for 5 years if it does have problems. Will update if that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dave

customer_reviews.title: I love Vornados
customer_reviews.text: Vornado heaters are great for spreading heat throughout a room. You don't have hot areas as with a quartz or ribbon heater. Vornados are very safe because the heat is designed to be low enough that combustion is very unlikely. Of course it has a shut off in case of tip over. The only thing I don't like is the electronic control. It is difficult to see the set temperature in the dark and there seems to be a several degree variation from the set temperature. I was happier with the less expensive version that just had a knob to adjust the temperature you want.
customer_reviews.author: David Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this heater. I've had Vornado fans and they were great. The temperature resets to 56°, regardless. I read instructions 3 times and still cant get it warmer. I'm calling Vornada customer service and if that doesn't help, I might as well buy another load of wood for stove. The problem with using my stove is having torn my shoulder, I can't carry much wood at a time. Sure thought Vornado would solve that problem.
customer_reviews.author: FayeBestDog

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help my winter heating bills with a GF who doesn't seem to understand that the old heaters in our place draw major energy to run. I'll update with the heating bill at the end of the month, but it seems to be a good little heater that will keep a room warm, not hot, but warm and comfortable very easily **EDIT March 2018*** Knocked this down to 1 star. Haven't even had this heater a year and it no longer blows air hot or cold. My first one is going strong, but this failed and has a mysterious fluid leaking from the back of it
customer_reviews.author: Spencer M

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give Vornado a one star, but the product simply deserves it. After turning it on and leaving it on for 3 mins a burning odor emits and gets stronger the longer it is left on. I'm afraid if I leave it on for more than 7 mins it will set off the fire alarm. My family has already been through one house fire and now responds to fire alarms as if they were shot at. To also note the fan has a constant clicking sound and doesn't seem to sound like the other AVH2 Plus heaters that I viewed on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Constantly tripped the circuit breaker
customer_reviews.text: I had two different Vornado heaters, the AVH2 and the VMH500. The AVH2 kept giving me issues and would constantly trigger my circuit breaker. After using it intermittent for two years, the wall plug that it was connected to also appeared slightly charred. I would not recommend the AVH2 as I am concerned about the safety using it as I am not sure why it kept triggering the circuit breaker and caused charring of my outlet. My other Vornado VMH500 heater never had any of those issue, and I did also try the VMH500 heater on that same outlet and never had the issue of the circuit breaker being tripped.
customer_reviews.author: Shuchen Chiang, Dennis Jow

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: I continue to use this company's products as they are well-made and provide excellent air movement. The unit continues to work overtime and I have never had any reason to be disappointed. Only thing I need to do is to contact the company to find out how to disassemble the front so that I could clean the dust that has built up on the blades. Proof that this product continues to work under all conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: An amazing little heater
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this heater to warm up my studio which is appended to my house and framed in on 3 sides with corrugated plastic as an outer shell, no insulation. The ambient temperature is 24degF. This heater has heated the 8X10ft. room to 32degF. in 3 hours. Wow! BTW, most of the heavy layer of snow has been removed. I wouldn't recommend heating the studio's interior with the snow still on the roof, because the plastic will get heated first and sag more, possibly being damaged. Please correct me if I'm wrong.
customer_reviews.author: marge123

customer_reviews.title: Will stop working
customer_reviews.text: Please DO NOT waste your money on this heater. It will stop working in a few months. Unfortunately by that time it'll be too late to return it back to Amazon. I used it for only a few hours during the week. It stopped working and the only way I could get it to come back on again was to unplug it and wait overnight - an absolute junk!
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it's suppose too
customer_reviews.text: Be aware the display is NOT back lit like it shows in all the pics and promo info, even on the box? Called Vorando and they said it was shown as lit for information purposes only which I told them is MISS information. Besides that th eauto control is WORTHLESS!? Temp set for 68 room temp 64 on a calibrated thermometer and the devices room temp reads 70 so turn it up to set temp of 71 heats room to over 78 and never turns off? Missed my return window anyone want this POS?
customer_reviews.author: why?

customer_reviews.title: I like it, with some tips and qualms
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the room warm. On ocassion, it seems as though it blows cool air. Where you place it in the room is important. Place it centrally, and, if in between two rooms, shut the door to the other room. Be careful not to ever pull the chord from the wall without first turning it off. I’m not sure if one should leave it running over night. I’m personally am not comfortable with doing that. Some parents might. But I do recommend this for apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Makhmali

customer_reviews.title: hopelessly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: i open the box and the letter is the first thing i see. on top of that, i try to turn the fan on and it's clearly in an inoperable state. i understand that i opted to buy it used for a cheaper price, but from my understanding "used" meant the box was opened and there were no other problems. absolutely shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For small rooms. No timer.
customer_reviews.text: Good for heating a small to medium sized room. Less than 150 sq ft. It has a temperature regulator that works ok. I wish it had a timer so it would turn on when I needed the room warm in the morning and evening. You can't even use one of those socket timers like other vornados because it has a digital display that needs to be turned on instead of physical buttons/switches. All in all it's decent.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Faulty Units
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these units. One was purchased in 2017 and the other in 2018. Both have been used sparingly and, when working, performed exactly as expected. Recently, however, the one purchased in 2018 stopped working--the display works but the fan will not spin. This leads me to believe that I received a defective unit since the one purchased in 2017, which has been used more frequently, seems to be working just fine. When it works this is a solid space heater. Unfortunately, I wouldn't recommend this product due to the inconsistent build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Casuco

customer_reviews.title: Not good for garage
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to help heat my garage here in Texas. It's a two car garage and although it gets in the mid 30's and 40's there are few hard freezes. I first rand it for about 5 hrs. Temp on unit said 61 at start and I had it set for 75 just to see how it worked. After 5 hrs. the temp read 64 or an increase of 3 degrees. So, it didn't help me at all. And yes, the garage door was closed. Maybe it works better indoors in a small room, but pass if you're looking to heat a garage.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I turned it on, it stopped and there was an awful burning electrical smell. Returned the next day.
customer_reviews.author: J Foster

customer_reviews.title: It lasted for a while, but it died. While it was alive, it was a bit annoying to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and used it for about a year before it stopped working all together. From the start, I already had issues where the heater would show extreme temperature readings. This caused the unit to not work until I unplugged the cord for a while. It was quite a frustrating experience. The heating options (when it worked) were amazing, though. It is fairly quiet for the most part (especially the low fan), and it does heat up a room pretty fast. I wouldn't recommend this product because of the heftier price for subpar quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Yang

customer_reviews.title: Quietest room heater I have ever not heard
customer_reviews.text: Heater came in two days and was delivered on a Sunday. Outstanding. The heater works better than expected and is more quiet than any area or space heater I have ever had. Would HIGHLY recommend it to anyone looking for a room heater of this type.
customer_reviews.author: RangerOne

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the area a nice steady temperature.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Vornado purchase. The other one was a smaller model and died after a couple years of continuous use. I use this one to keep about 500-600 sq ft at a comfortable temperature until I can get my real heaters installed. After that I will probably use this to heat up the bathroom in the morning for a warm shower.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and sturdy  whole room heater
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet and dependable. Needed this for small bedroom office. It is really sturdy and this model has auto settings and digital controls which I prefer to manual settings. Worth the higher price than other Vornado heaters. Added plus is the fan setting for general use. Tip over and overheat protection which many portable heaters do not have.
customer_reviews.author: lakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Auto comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several heaters from Vornado and others. This unit is especially good, because it has an automatic variable fan and isn't too noisy. It is easy to sleep and very efficient in temperature maintenance. It is light and not too large, with a convenient built in handle.
customer_reviews.author: uaflyer

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: ive purchased many space heaters, this is by far the BEST space heater. Very efficient, the most output for low wattage. It saves me a ton of money and warms my RV in 20 degree weather so well, that I don't need my gas heater. A must have for anything 500 feet or smaller. Well done on this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Vargas

customer_reviews.title: A great heater
customer_reviews.text: We have used this heater every day since we purchased it and it is wonderful. You can control the level of heat very easily and it heats the room (ours is 12' x 24') quite quickly. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a safe, reliable heater.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Love

customer_reviews.title: Warms alk the corners of a room without hard air blowing on you!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Vornado for 20 years and it still works great! So I bought this one for my elderly brother that lives in a small mobile home and doesn't have a HVAC system. He loves this little heater! Makes him warm and toasty and not expensive to run!
customer_reviews.author: Nina592

customer_reviews.title: ... the settings which seem obvious but don't exactly work like you would think
customer_reviews.text: A little confusing with the settings which seem obvious but don't exactly work like you would think. I really like this but it blew out our socket and smelled like fire. I am sure it has to do with the older electricity in our home but I had it in my child's room who was sleeping and I just happened to check on him. I guess with any heater, check the voltage and safety of your outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: First the good. It heats well
customer_reviews.text: First the good. It heats well. The bad news is that it shakes, rattles, and makes an unbelievable amount of noise. It scares my dog. Whoever assembled this thing must have not done a good job or tested it because I can't believe that this is how the product ought to be.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Keene

customer_reviews.title: Too bad it doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Vornado I've had and the second one that has just stopped working. The real bummer? I can't return this one as it's past the return date criteria. Booooo..... Too bad it doesn't last, because it works great when it's actually working. I wouldn't waste your money, unless the manufacturer has no problem replacing it every time it quits working. Not happy!!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Does Not work for long!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these in December 2019. One of them worked for two weeks and was replaced by Amazon the next day. Great response from Amazon. The next one quit three weeks later, outside of the Amazon return time, on to the manufacturer, replacement no problem. IT QUIT ALREADY! We use one in my wife's office and one in the bathroom, they are not ON full time. They said it's not intended for full time use. Our original Vornado that one was in use in our bathroom was 13 years old. I would say that Quality of the Vornado has certainly gone down over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought dec 5 and stopped working Feb 20th.
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Dec 5th 2017. Stopped working on Feb 20th 2018. You get a good three months! Used on and off about 1-3 times a week for 3-4 hours each time. I ignored the negative reviews thinking it wouldn't happen to me. Save yourself money go with another brand. What broke on mine.... you ask?....the fan. Good luck if you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ascend

customer_reviews.title: WEAK BREEZE HEAT!!!!! FAN TOO WHY?
customer_reviews.text: Aske for same day return because the unit felt very weak in power from Breeze of Heater which is suppose to warm up whole room but failed miserably unles this one was a lemonade? Disappointed because I love VORNADO FANS yet the Heater Model was quite not remarkable gadget of necessity during freezing tempurtures and also kept on shutting down Electric Outlet Surge Suppressor being activated constantly?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ram

customer_reviews.title: Really quiet, heats well, no issues!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned Vornado fans in the past, which were great and wanted to try the Vornado heater. Very pleased with my purchase. Raises the temp in large rooms (12 x 18) by at least two degrees and way more in smaller rooms (12 x 12). No other heater that I’ve owned comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Regretted purchase
customer_reviews.text: This definitely a regretted purchase. It keeps shutting off even though I use a power surge strip. It's not simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sinfunni

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Space Heater!
customer_reviews.text: This space heater is by far the best I've had. I've had various other heaters: ones that glow red with heat to ones that don't blow warm air but still raise your electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this heater a couple of times this season but am very impressed with the heat output and it’s quietness. It’s not meant to heat an entire floor but for a single room it works great. Not loud at all and Heated the room up fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Fails within 6 days
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very will for a few days. I set the termostat at 68 and it kept the room very comfortable. By day 6 the fan and the heater stopped working. The digital display continued to work but the heater refused to come on. I unplugged it. I did the recommended reset but nothing worked. I now have a dead heater. Do not buy this heater! There is very poor quality control. It is junk. You can not rely on it. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you money!
customer_reviews.text: This heater lasted one year with occasional evening use. The fan started rattling so loud it was unusable. It Finally just died. The digital controls are ok but it would be nice if you didn't have to reset the temp each and every time you turn it on. The thermostat is way off. My old Vornado lasted 10+ years before it quit. I'm hoping the new replacement (non digital) Vornado lasts at least half of that. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a month.
customer_reviews.text: I was loving ours - we bought three for different problem areas in our house. Approx one month after we started using them, though, two of them have up and died on us. They weren’t overheated - in both cases, we tried turning them on from cold, and no response.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Wong

customer_reviews.title: Best heater for a thermostatic heating!
customer_reviews.text: Great for heating to a specific temp. Most heaters heat past a specific temperature then cool past it as well. This heats a room well and maintains the temp. I’ve saved a lot of money on my electrical bill, since buying two of them to heat rooms, that my zonal heating doesn’t heat well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonish

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. It made a rattling noise the first time it was plugged in, but was able to finally get the noise to stop. Recently it started making a slighter noise and then quit completely. It has been used approximately 6 months. That’s a lot of money for a product that lasts 6 months without continuous use!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis H Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Lose power and no more heat. Tip over and problem.
customer_reviews.text: 1 is enough to heat a 20 ft rv. But, if you have the avh2, when you lose power the unit will not turn back on. So this will not work to keep rv warm during long absences. It also dosnt have a tip over sensor. Other than that I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: bubajones

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: It was true. All those reviews about '1 month later'. Mine stopped providing warmth after 3 weeks. We only felt wind coming out.
customer_reviews.author: wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids playroom. On past ratings it was said that this Vornado could heat up at least 1 room. Not quite. It only heats whatever is directly in front of it. So basically it does not heat up a room.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha H.

customer_reviews.title: Sucks as a fan
customer_reviews.text: I was super hyped to get this because of the reviews. Come to find out, this thing barely blows any air! I expected a high-powered fan with a name like "vornado." Instead, I got something that whispers air into my ear and says, "I suck as a fan."
customer_reviews.author: TomTom

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good heater.  It doesn't do the job. Get the Lasko.
customer_reviews.text: It blows cool air has to be unplugged and restarted, thermostat will not work, Trash. Had to go back and find the old Lasko 6462.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: breaks after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful product. My first one lasted a week -the second a bit longer, but not much. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple of months then stopped. Fan did not turn on and no heat. Just dead during the coldest week of the winter. I’ve purchased several of the Vornado heaters and a previous one only lasted a winter season but I bought another because I liked how they heat up a room and are quiet. Now I need another heater but won’t spend $90 for something that breaks down after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M

customer_reviews.title: Reliable brand
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand not as good for cooling. There are better.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my 4 kennel dog /barn. Worked great at keeping my desired temperature at 68 degrees which has 4 indoor/outdoor doggie doors. Purchased 4 more for my grandchildrens rooms to keep them at a steady temp during winter months . Will definitely purchase again when needed. This was a 4th attempt to buy a heating system for my kennels and it worked out perfect. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: great dont hesitate turns it self on and off heats a large room up well and surprisingly quickly
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Quit after a couple months of light use!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously not worth the cost. Bought back in October... 4 months in (very light usage) it has completely stopped working! I saw so many reviews warning about this. I should of listened and not purchased. Don’t waste $85 on a heater that last a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: M Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Its ALWAYS on....
customer_reviews.text: It seems to run more than previous model. It shuts off eventually, but it runs for a long while at lower power for some reason, then it finally stops. This doesn't seem like an improvement over the earlier model of vornado space heater I had that ran, got the room warm, shut off, and came back on when the room got cold.
customer_reviews.author: Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months. Barely used.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I didn’t ignore all the product reviews about this product dying so soon. Mine died 64 days after purchased. Past my return window... R.I.P
customer_reviews.author: Ron Santos

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this March 15th, 2019 and today is November 15th and the damn thing is dead! Doesn’t work anymore. Fan dead. I highly do not suggest you buy this product. It’s cheap. Way to go Vornado!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: warm
customer_reviews.text: works like a charm. I had one like it for years, so glad I replaced with the same. thank you
customer_reviews.author: harey14

customer_reviews.title: Love my new heaters!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these heaters to supplement the heat, especially to prevent the heat pump from kicking over to emergency heat. I'm now warmer as I'm heating more of the house where I actually am versus the whole house. The heaters keep the temp more consistent now too. They are also very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, not not exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It appears well built. Quiet. But one note... the specifications call out that it has three temperature levels. It only has high, low and fan only.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Always used on the lowest setting to heat a small insulated room in my barn.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the thermostat could be set lower than 60 degrees, would like 50 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: T J F

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Did not work properly. When it reaches the temperature you’ve set it on, it starts to blow cold air instead of turning off. I’ve got 2 $12 heaters with safety features that work so much better than my 2 Vornados that barely heat up a 5x5 space, if that. Sometimes they randomly blow cold air, and just don’t work right at all!
customer_reviews.author: sarahle2003

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and efficient, all why doing the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These little guys really heat the room and in short order. We’ve had a brutal cold snap this year and we used these to help regulate temps in the house and to prevent our heat pump auxiliary from kicking in.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Myth

customer_reviews.title: Never buy this brand again!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was great until it wasn’t. Very disappointed that it just quit working after the warranty was up! We bought it in November 2019 and it died in February 2020!
customer_reviews.author: P. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan on a daily basis. In the winter I use the 2 heat settings and in the summer I use the plain fan setting. It really is a wonderful little powerhouse. I haven't seen any spikes in my energy bill too which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: H. Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, but unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely, just like the previous generation of this fan that I bought several years ago (and still use, in a different location). The fan is quiet, and doesn't feel like it is blowing very hard (which is nice), yet it will warm up my cold basement office fairly quickly. I particularly like that it will cycle itself to maintain a steady temperature in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Tesar

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: We do not have an exhaust fan in our bathroom. So we get mold sometimes. This thing keeps bathroom dry. Has a timer so it doesn’t have to stay on all day. It works for heat as well as keeping bathroom dry
customer_reviews.author: john howard

customer_reviews.title: Mine must've been defective...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long, that's for sure. Which I'm very surprised due to how many Vornados I've bought and still use with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend, heats up nicely and does not raise electric bill
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 months after buying then failed at the beginning of the winter season. Not sure if worth the effort/cost of sending back for warranty repair,
customer_reviews.author: David Turkington

customer_reviews.title: Proper use of control functions per manual will yield impressive results.
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to heat a chilly small bedroom. It is very quiet, cool to the touch and keeps an even heat throughout the room. I first experienced this unit in a medical practitioner's office, much larger than my bedroom, and was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Master Of None

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater
customer_reviews.text: This heater does everything advertised, and I have been very pleased with its performance AND it's durability day in/day out.
customer_reviews.author: Max C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome heater! We originally bought this to place under our RV while wintering in the North, but turned out to not need it for that purpose. We do use it in the RV and it works great! It's quiet, and I absolutely love that the heater never feels hot!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K

customer_reviews.title: So far, it is working as advertised. It ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, it is working as advertised. It is quiet, heats the room adequately, and I haven't noticed any spikes in my electric bill even though I have used it quite a bit and the weather has been quite cold. I can't give it 5 stars because I can't gauge longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Heats a room fast!
customer_reviews.text: Small, light weight but packs a punch. Took the chill out of a 20 x 14 room in minutes and keeps the temp set to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Rajun Cajun

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater for a large bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this little heater a 6/5 review I would. Very safe heater being used in our daughter’s nursery. The thermostat keeps the room the perfect temperature and completely shuts off until the temperature drops again. The unit is cool to touch on all surfaces even while running. The plug does not overheat. Highly recommend this unit for a large bedroom! Heats the room in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sablik

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because reviews were positive; however, after using for less than a month the fan stopped working. Low quality. Buy another brand. I wish I would have returned and got my money back but my return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the bills
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt this is the best small heater for the money, to buy and to run awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wineman

customer_reviews.title: Fan burned out is less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for almost a year but the fan is burned out now. I didn’t over use the heater or keep it running for days at a time.. either way it should have lasted more than a year... my $25 space heather is still working just fine and does almost as good a job as this one. I bought the newer model of this one earlier this year to have two good ones so fingers crossed that one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: summer taggart

customer_reviews.title: Save your money get something else
customer_reviews.text: Very poor performance in heating more cold air then heat.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Miceli

customer_reviews.title: I have a smaller Vornado that doesn't do that--and I love it--have used it for over 5 years w/o a ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it shorted out every socket I plugged it into. I have a smaller Vornado that doesn't do that--and I love it--have used it for over 5 years w/o a problem.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. I sleep in the attic where it gets very cold in the winter and very hot in the summer. This thing kept me warm throughout this first winter in MN.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Welcome Addition To Cope With Changing Weather
customer_reviews.text: I live in a place where the heat is turned off at a certain date, but in New England the weather isn't all that exact and many times it is cold during the early part of the day or at night. The Vornado AVH2 has proved to be a welcome addition indeed, and I can highly recommend it to anyone. It is also easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Ferol Austen

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one week.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was really happy with this product. It was able to heat up my whole bedroom. However, I went to turn it on the other night and it would not work. The control panel on the top worked and would turn on, but no heat is coming out. I bought this less than two weeks ago and I cant return it because I threw out the original box. I'm very disapointed considering how expensive it is.
customer_reviews.author: vs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: This heater was purchased to warm up our bedroom since it sits over the unheated garage. It does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Paetz

customer_reviews.title: Not Great Output, CRAZY Clicking Noises
customer_reviews.text: Within 8 months the heater started making crazy clicking noises whenever you turned it on and the heat output is pretty crappy unless you have it right up against your body. Had to contact Vornado directly and they will be sending a replacement unit.
customer_reviews.author: ChelseaWears

customer_reviews.title: Ok fan, pricey. It seems to me it ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok fan, pricey. It seems to me it would be more effective if it had an oscillating option. I bought for my husband but would have returned if it was up to me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This heater is outstanding! It self regulates temp/fan speed to the temperature you set. I love it. I use it in my rv during colder temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: leurinimj

customer_reviews.title: Died after two years of light use.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this heater, but it died after 2 1/2 years of light use. My other room heater is over 20 years old and still works.
customer_reviews.author: Bhagwan Bill

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: keep s a small room or RV comfortable while remaining quiet
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Works great gets the room nice and warm in no time ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great gets the room nice and warm in no time it's quiet and shuts itself off when room reaches the temperature that you requested.
customer_reviews.author: T. Echols

customer_reviews.title: Failed in 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great while it worked. Just 5 weeks after purchase, it will no longer do anything. Display works but fan and heater no longer turn onon.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Sheth

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEAT PUT OUT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recommended this item... I was skeptical that such a small job would really heat my family basement. It worked GREAT! Room size19x25. Cool to the touch. Didn't take long to warm entire room & love thermostat feature
customer_reviews.author: Tee W

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a year which was surprising considering I didn’t use it all that much. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and works great!
customer_reviews.text: It really heats up the room quickly! Very affordable too. My room is about 12x12, and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MadeleineAlexis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have it in a bedroom and it works great! Very quiet running.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Type of heat it produces.
customer_reviews.text: I like that when you touch the heater you do not get burned! Awesome heater!!! Want another one
customer_reviews.author: Guietta Payne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it stopped working after a few days so I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, warms up the room very well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small and portable unit. easy to bring from room to room with a carry handle built in. Has a good fan to force hot air throughout the room. Price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Noriko Tomuro

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a few weeks and the performance does not justify the price
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

product_meta.title: Vornado AVH2 Plus Whole Room Heater with Automatic Climate Control, Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:AVH2 PlusUsing electronic auto climate temperature control, the AVH2 Plus eliminates annoying hot and cold cycles, maintaining the set temperature while using less energy. The AVH2 Plus incorporates Vornado’s signature vortex technology to fully circulate the warm air throughout the room, creating a uniform temperature throughout. User-friendly push-button controls and a timer, along with a digital screen, put all of the heater’s functions at your fingertips. And a cool-touch case and overheat protection offer peace of mind — as does the 5-year warranty. High Exit Air Temperature - 120, Low Exit Air Temperature - 130

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.
feature_bullets: HEAT DIFFERENTLY — Gently heat all in the air in a small to medium-sized room through vortex air circulation without using intense heat, similar to how a forced air furnace works, just on a smaller scale. The hertz value is 60 HZ

HEAT EFFICIENTLY —Use the digital display and push-button controls to select between the 2 heat settings (Low/750W, High/1500W), fan only option, and 12-hour timer to tailor heat output and energy consumption
AUTO CLIMATE CONTROL — Intelligently senses how much heat and circulation is needed to maintain set temperature, and makes adjustments automatically so you don't have to.
HEAT SAFELY — Advanced safety features include a cool-touch exterior and an automatic safety shut-off system for worry-free use.
SUPERIOR SUPPORT — Backed by a 5-year promise and supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS. Assembled in the USA.
Built to meet U. S. Voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U. S.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars562 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
